intent_atoms.description: Provide a parser for the 'stss' sync sample table box that decodes its contents and makes the data available to downstream consumers.
The parser must correctly decode version/flags, entry counts, and sync sample numbers from the stss box.
When the stss box is empty, the parser should return an empty list of sync samples without error.
If the stss box contains truncated entries (i.e., fewer bytes than required for a full entry), parsing should fail gracefully and be detected by tests.
The SyncSampleTableBox model must always expose the parsed sync sample numbers as well‑to‑witness? (explanation missing).

functional_units.name: SyncSampleTable Parser
functional_units.description: Parses 'stss' sync sample table boxes decoding version/flags, entry counts, and sync sample numbers into structured data

functional_units.name: ParsedBoxPayload SyncSampleTableBox Model
functional_units.description: Extends ParsedBoxPayload to include a SyncSampleTableBox model representing sync sample metadata

functional_units.name: JSON Export for SyncSampleTableBox
functional_units.description: Provides JSON export coverage so CLI/UI can surface sync sample metadata

functional_units.name: StssSyncSampleTableParser Tests
functional_units.description: Unit tests validating happy path, empty table, and truncated entry scenarios for the parser

functional_units.name: JSONExportSnapshot Tests
functional_units.description: Tests ensuring JSON parse tree snapshots include new structured sync sample payload
